settings.text: This is an Image with text content block that you can add to your product page by using the product.details template included in the Turbo theme. Use some high impact images to promote cross-sales, or try a team photo and link to your About page, to tell visitors more about the folks behind the products.

settings.title: introducing a flexible new page template
settings.content:
A great "About" page helps build trust between you and your customers.
The more content you provide about you and your business, the more confident people will be when purchasing from your store.
An interesting and authentic About page can even increase sales, so spend time crafting a compelling one!

settings.title: Meet our Portland crew
settings.text: Whether it's running, dancing, yoga, pilates, boxing, or trampolining - we all love moving, and believe that movement heals your soul. We are a dynamic crew of likeminded folks who care about the wellness of others in our community. We love partnering with other locals for events and collaborations, and are always open to new ideas. We focus on bringing people together in our space where everybody is always welcome.

"I received my support belt about three days ago. I was in severe pain as I am a small body carrying two babies and was having a hard time walking, standing, and sitting. However, once I received the belt I am mediately put it on and got immediate results! Thank you for making my life more tolerable during my twin pregnancy! And for anyone wondering about sizing I’m 4 foot 11 and I weigh 140 pounds and I got a size medium."

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ - Paige Clark

✅ Verified Buyer

"These clippers are AMAZING! My dog is a Morkie ( Yorkshire terrier/ Maltese ). His hair is really fine and resembles human-like hair. Every clipper we have used will NOT cut. But these, they cut like nothing. We didn’t even need the guards on it. I would highly suggest these if you are tired of taking your dog to a groomer and spending $60 or more. These also cut through the Matting that my dog had. 😊”

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐- Katy L 

✅ Verified Buyer

"Love this thing. Got the hang of it quickly. I'm 5'9" and 280lbs, it was making me sweat after less than 5 minutes. Chronic back pain and it doesn't hurt my back yay!, the biggest thing is it is so much fun so I don't feel frustrated with doing it as exercise!😊”


⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐- Mollie C.

✅ Verified Buyer

settings.title: Do you offer a guarantee? Can I return my item?
settings.subtitle:
Of course. We offer an extended 30 day guarantee! ☑️

If you aren’t 100% satisfied with your items, or received faulty goods, simply email our customer support team at  info@bigbleubox.com. Please include the email address associated with the order and describe the issue, include photos if possible. We always aim to respond in 3 days or less!

settings.title: Can I track my order?
settings.subtitle:
Once your order has been shipped, you’ll receive a tracking number via email. Note, it can take up to 7 days for shipping activity to update.

Have your tracking number to hand? You can track your order's status here.

settings.title: Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.subtitle: Sure! You can cancel, or change your order within 24 hours of confirmation. Please contact us with your name and order number at:  info@bigbleubox.com.

settings.title: How long does shipping take? When will I receive my order?
settings.subtitle:
It all depends on your country! Find your region and estimated delivery time below.

Region Delivery Estimate

UNITED STATES 7-21 DAYS

CANADA 7-21 DAYS

UNITED KINGDOM 7-21 DAYS

AUSTRALIA 7-21 DAYS

ALL OTHER COUNTRIES 14 TO 35 DAYS
